mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD_LIST(FOOD_ID,FOOD_TYPE, FOOD_NAME, FOOD_PRICE, FOOD_PROTEIN, FOOD_FAT, FOOD_CARB, FOOD_STOCK, IS_SELLING) VALUES(FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{foodType}, #{foodName}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodProtein},#{foodFat},#{foodCarb}, #{foodStock}, #{isSelling})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FOOD_LIST ORDER BY FOOD_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOD_LIST SET FOOD_STOCK = #{foodStock}, FOOD_PRICE = #{foodPrice}, IS_SELLING = #{isSelling} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD_LIST SET FOOD_STOCK = FOOD_STOCK - #{foodAmount} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
UPDATE FOOD_LIST SET FOOD_AVG_RATING = #{avgRating}, FOOD_REVIEW_CNT = #{reviewCnt} WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId}
